name: Atopes
description:
A story where "The Soul is the World".
It is an eden we would be willing to sacrifice everything for.
It is about "Atopes", which grants your soul the ability to exceed its limits.

Experience the dramatic turn of events, and see the world change around you.


――――――――
You, the player, are expected to do great things.
The protagonist of the story isn't the flying bunny rabbit, but "you" in front of the monitor.
Everything in this game, is to be fully internalized by "you" .

To pursue the end of the story, you must awaken from that world, and transfer to the new world.

If you're in a dream, will you be able to tell that it's a dream?



・Genre
Philosophy (+Shoot 'em Up, etc.)

・Game Engine
Unity



  • Certain features of this game may prove troublesome to live stream.
